name: EXO - Arena Queuing Simulator
description:
This was the Archived page of the last game Tundra Entertainment would create before going bankrupt in 20XX. Below is the original description of said game

Now in our most recent addition to the Tundra Collection and the most highly anticipated game that we've all been waiting for. It's finally the return of EXO Arena. We come bringing you our greatest gameplay ever originated from Exo and modernizing it to fit our Brand new standards for you and us!

Today we show you our newest additions to our game from the Original (Now defunct) EXO 1:

-

And Even more Soon to come!

Make sure to BUY EVERYTHING BUY OUR BATTLE PASS BE ONE WITH CAPITALISM MAKE US RICHER

Come to the store once in a while to come and support us, making games is hard and we'd love your support! Coming from all 80,000 of us.

You may encounter some Queuing issues but we promise it's gonna be fixed soon enough.

So now play our game (again)

Breaking character for a sec:

Yeah this is just a troll game and there isn't really a game here, it's just to make fun of the overwatch 2 Queuing and how abysmally slow it is. and also poking fun at Blizzard and AAA studios in general making dumb choices.
